question: [CY] Equality and diversity questions
paragraph1: [CY] These are optional questions about you.
paragraph2: [CY] Your answers won’t affect your application.
paragraph3: [CY] They won’t be shared with anyone involved in your case.
paragraph4: [CY] Your answers will help us check we are treating people fairly and equally.
paragraph5: [CY] Find out how we use this information in our privacy policy.
